features: KEEP IT SMOOTH: Our below the waist moisturizing lotion for men prevents chafing.
GETS BETTER AS YOU USE IT: We created an anti-chafing lotion that goes on as a thick cream and transforms to a smooth, gliding lotion.
ENJOY YOUR ME TIME: Keep a bottle of Cake’s So-Low Lotion in your nightstand for easy access. Our men’s lotion is designed for use below the belt.

EASY CLEAN UP: Worry less about the mess. Our men’s moisturizing lotion is non-greasy and easy to clean up. We use a nourishing combination of coconut oil, avocado oil, and aloe vera that absorbs into your skin leaving it nourished and moisturized.
CLEAN, NOURISHING FORMULA: Take care of yourself in more ways than one. Our So-Low Lotion contains only clean, nourishing ingredients. Our body lotion is dye-free, fragrance-free, and paraben-free.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I was impressed by this lotion for the price and the amount of lotion you receive! It's not sticky, and it lubricates very well! It also makes your nether region very soft and feels great. would def recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: An amazing product. Creates no friction and lasts and lasts and lasts. So easy to clean up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 20, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice. Different. Satisfying. Try some....
reviews.reviewText: I really like this stuff. It does what it claims to do. Unique texture and hand feel. I don't have to use a lot; reapply only about twice an hour. (I’ve learned to start with a bit more on my hand to begin with). It's a bit less slippery than Albolene (which is all oils) but also less messy. However, it is much more costly. But, it seems a little goes a long way. My personal analysis is simple--So Low offers a very nice tactile-sensual experience that I think is just right for longer sessions of row-your-own-canoe handiwork.A Russian proverb (paraphrased) says, "We each row our own boat in our own way." When I'm the captain of the boat, I've found this to be a nice, unique, satisfying first-mate to have at hand (right or left). I understand that some people may stick with the many gummy, quick-to-dry-out lotions they are used to (remember the Russians). That’s cool. For them.I suggest trying it, especially if you like long edging sessions. I've bought a second tube before the first is used up and a smaller tube at a local big box store (for a logical 1/2 the price of the bigger one) just for travel. The fact that I want some with me when traveling is a big, strong thumb's up from me—from both hands.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great product to use yes. And I’m sure the people and customer service is awesome. However my thing was it’s basically the same as lotion, and lube mix. It didn’t last as long as I thought it would. I used it 1 time since I bought it. I would recommend if you use lotion forsure. I usually do it dry. Definitely needed it as I do it daily or more a day needed to relieve my skin down there!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: What did I expect from something that was made for a specific purpose? It fulfills its role in this purpose extremely well. Starts like a cream and is rather too thick for my liking, but quickly becomes slick, very pleasant, and… well, the rest is history.Yes, it’s unscented, but there is also a minor, pleasant smell to it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Fine, but not stellar
reviews.reviewText: This is one of a few similar products I've tried and is probably my least favorite. In my experience, it rubs in rather than slicking up and I find myself having to use a lot.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for long edging sessions. A man's best friend. My friends love it too
reviews.reviewText: I was skeptical at first, due to the mainstreamed nature of this product and the cost. I wasn't sure how long it would last. I'm a big fan now. I bought my first container in early September and there is still some left in late December, and I use it A LOT! I use it at least once a day, sometimes twice.I wouldn't consider it a lotion, but a cream....but it warms up to be like a lotion.I am circumcised so I need it for self pleasure to be more long lasting. I really like this stuff. I do need to apply it once or twice for each session, depending how long I am edging. I shared it with some friends when hanging out and edging, they love it too. When reapplying using the same hand with the lotion on it, the container doesn't get sticky. It's easy to clean up and my keyboard and phone wipes up easy too.I'm very much looking forward to my next container. I live overseas and having it shipped here too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this lube!
reviews.reviewText: Men, this lube gives you all the pleasure you want and more. Goes on like a cream, warms and tingles the your rod giving you a good hard start...they suddenly turns into a very slick and silky lube that can last for an hour without needing more. Give yourself a good gob of it and just enjoy the sensations... you'll thank God you're a man.
